name: Jay Hill Racers
description:
really enjoy. The feeling of finishing a game you've had on your mind is incredible, even if it's just a simple game like snake. Instead of waiting for something to happen I opened trello and started writing up things I wanted to add into the game. Game development would start the next day. And so I did.

The first day was the hardest and I was about to drop more than one time, but I managed everything through the help of countless tutorials and experience from other projects.

My intention from the beginning was to upload this game once I'm finished to get your opinion on how you liked it, and maybe some suggestions. I don't plan on picking it up for now once I start my next week long project but some major bug fixes or really nice updates can still be done. So feel free to message me!

A list of dropped features due to lack of time and/or motivation and/or ideas: 

  • AI to play against
  • Multiplayer
  • More items (like slow down time)
  • Grand Prix overview after finishing that shows an evaluation of how well you did and gives you a rank
  • Much more that I just forgot about

In any way, please share your experience after playing this game. I really liked it, but thats mainly due to it being my own game. Tell me what I can do better next time! Cheers!

All the information that is important to play the game properly should be available in-game. If something is missing, let me know.
